TopicTitle: Searching for a specific mod (wheel mod)

Articles.Content: I've seen this mod before but I can't remember the name nor am I able to find it. I know it is a mod that brings in customizable wheels which you can edit in any way. If I'm correct, the mod was developed by BahamutoD. I would really appreciate it if any of you know or have seen this mod to reply with a link to the mod page. Thanks!!!
Since this is a question about an Add-On, we'll be moving this to the General Add-On Affairs subforum. Carry on

I believe the mod you're looking for is BahamutoD's Adjustable Landing Gear.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/99660-0-25-Adjustable-Landing-Gear-v1-0-1-Nov-9

TT's Modular Multi-Wheels

Kerbal Foundries Wheelpack
Thanks to Rthsom for finding the mod that I was looking for and thank you to everyone else who had helped here!!
